item.title: 船舶堆积，液化天然气运价跌至历史最低水平
item.description: 液化天然气运输成本急剧下降，因为市场上船只过剩，这一情况可能会减轻天然气进口商的负担，并有助于提高贸易商的利润。【原文：Liquefied natural gas shipping costs are plummeting as the market grapples with a glut of vessels, a development that could provide relief for gas importers and help pad profits for traders.】

item.title: 印度购房者迎来好消息，地产股感受到热度
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普回调关税威胁，人民币上涨
item.description: 有迹象表明，唐纳德-特朗普总统正在收回对中国出口征收更高关税的威胁，人民币与对中国经济敏感的货币一起走高。【原文：The yuan advanced alongside currencies sensitive to China’s economy, amid signs that President Donald Trump is dialing back threats of slapping higher tariffs on exports there.】

item.title: 2024 年是洛杉矶港有史以来第二繁忙的一年
item.description: 由于关税的不确定性和供应链分流给南加州带来了持续的进口浪潮，这个美国最繁忙的海港在 2024 年结束时的贸易量接近历史最高纪录。【原文：The busiest US seaport finished 2024 with near-record trade volumes as tariff uncertainty and supply chain diversions brought a sustained wave of imports through Southern California.】

item.title: 日本央行有望实现 18 年来最大幅度加息
item.description: 位于东京的日本银行总部。【原文：The Bank of Japan headquarters in Tokyo.】

item.title: 富士媒体股价因计划成立调查小组而反弹
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc. shares rebounded after saying it plans to set up a third-party panel to probe a growing alleged sexual harassment scandal involving an employee at its TV station.】

item.title: 亚马逊裁员促使加拿大审查政府协议
item.description: 加拿大工业部长表示，亚马逊公司关闭在魁北克省的所有仓库并裁员 1900 多人的决定将促使政府审查目前与这家电子商务和技术公司的交易。【原文：Canada’s industry minister said Amazon.com Inc.’s decision to shut down all warehouses in Quebec and cut more than 1,900 jobs would prompt the government to examine its current deals with the e-commerce and technology company.】

item.title: 印度塔塔汽车公司和马鲁蒂铃木公司因节日需求和折扣而获得喘息机会
item.description: 巴吉汽车有限公司、塔塔汽车有限公司和印度马鲁蒂铃木有限公司本应在上一季度的节日期间，在印度经济低迷的情况下获得一些支持。【原文：Bajaj Auto Ltd., Tata Motors Ltd. and Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. should have found some support during last quarter’s festive season in an otherwise sluggish Indian economy.】

item.title: 爱迪生公司提交加州拉古娜野火事件报告
item.description: 爱迪生国际旗下的南加州爱迪生电力公司称，在加利福尼亚州文图拉县拉古纳大火开始前不久，一辆汽车撞击并损坏了一根电线杆，导致电路继电器。【原文：Edison International’s Southern California Edison utility said that a vehicle struck and damaged a utility pole, resulting in a circuit relay shortly before the start of the Laguna Fire in Ventura County, California.】

item.title: 特朗普是如何转向加密货币的？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统曾经对数字资产持怀疑态度，称比特币 "似乎是个骗局"，加密货币的价值 "建立在稀薄空气的基础上"。【原文：President Donald Trump was once skeptical of digital assets, saying Bitcoin “seems like a scam” and that crypto’s value was “based on thin air.”】

item.title: 投资者对债务狂潮后印度影子银行的疲软持谨慎态度
item.description: 投资者对印度影子贷款机构的债务越来越挑剔，在 2024 年该行业的外债销售额创下多年新高后，这给市场上的小公司带来了麻烦。【原文：Investors are growing increasingly selective with Indian shadow lenders’ debt, spelling trouble for smaller players in the market after the sector’s multi-year high foreign debt sales in 2024.】

item.title: 中国收益率曲线趋于平坦，中国人民银行购债成为焦点
item.description: 中国人民银行停止购买债券的决定加剧了短端利率的上升，并使收益率曲线趋于平坦，从而刺激了对央行可能恢复购买政府债务的押注。【原文：The People’s Bank of China’s decision to halt bond buying is exacerbating the rise in short-end rates and flattening the yield curve, spurring bets the central bank may resume government debt purchases.】

item.title: 新加坡房价跳涨 2.3%，抑制投机行为愈演愈烈
item.description: 新加坡房价在 2024 年最后一个季度的涨幅与最初估计的持平，人们猜测政府可能会在今年采取干预措施为市场降温。【原文：Singapore home prices rose at the same pace as initially estimated in the last quarter of 2024, amid speculation that the government may intervene to cool the market this year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称交易员正伺机抛售美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的数据显示，即使美元的主导地位在市场上肆虐，但寻求抛售世界储备货币的交易商远比想象的要多。【原文：Traders looking to sell the world’s reserve currency are far more common than thought even as the dollar’s dominance rips across markets, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 关税威胁刺激避风港需求，黄金有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 由于交易员们权衡了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对欧洲的最新关税威胁，以及他誓言推动更多降息措施，黄金维持在10月以来的最高点附近。【原文：Gold held near the highest since October as traders weighed President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threat against Europe, along with his vow to push for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 液化天然气公司 Venture Global 通过缩小 IPO 规模募集 17.5 亿美元资金
item.description: Venture Global 公司首次公开募股募集了 17.5 亿美元，股票定价处于市场定价范围的中间位置。【原文：Venture Global Inc. raised $1.75 billion in its initial public offering, pricing its shares in the middle of a marketed range.】

item.title: 台湾散户投资者 2024 年购买美国资产金额创历史新高
item.description: 台湾的零售交易商去年购买的美国资产净额创下历史新高，这是因为台湾家庭将目光投向了传统保险产品之外，以寻求更高的回报。【原文：Taiwan’s retail traders bought a net record amount of US assets last year, as households look beyond traditional insurance products in search of higher returns.】

item.title: 新加坡央行自 2020 年以来首次放宽货币政策
item.description: 新加坡中央银行自 2020 年以来首次放宽了货币政策设置，因为物价压力有减弱的迹象。【原文：Singapore’s central bank eased its monetary policy settings for the first time since 2020 as price pressures show signs of abating.】

item.title: GfK 称英国消费者信心降至一年多来最低点
item.description: 随着英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）预算案的影响持续到新的一年，英国家庭信心跌至工党重新执政前的最低点。【原文：UK household confidence tumbled to the lowest since before Labour returned to power as the fallout from Chancellor Rachel Reeves’ budget continued into the new year.】

item.title: 特朗普回国令亚洲本已疲软的盈利前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 希望财报能重振亚洲股市的投资者可能要失望了，因为即将公布的财报很可能显示，即使在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上任之前，企业的日子也不好过。【原文：Investors hoping for earnings to revive Asian stocks may be in for a let-down as upcoming results are likely to show companies were having a tough time even before Donald Trump took office.】

item.title: TikTok 的可能买家，从埃隆-马斯克到怪兽先生
item.description:
这款应用程序原本将被禁用，现在有了更多的时间来寻找归宿和解决国家安全问题

。【原文：

The app, which was set to be banned, now has a bit more time to find a home and address national security issues

】

item.title: 特朗普震荡市场，石油将迎来今年首次周度下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出贸易战的前景，并表示他将在就任美国新总统的头几天要求沙特阿拉伯和欧佩克（OPEC）降低油价之后，石油价格出现了今年以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for the first weekly decline this year after Donald Trump raised the prospect of trade wars and said he will ask Saudi Arabia and OPEC to lower prices in his first few days as the new US president.】

item.title: 日本通胀率跃升至 3%，为加息提供支持
item.description: 就在日本央行行长上田一夫预计央行将第三次加息的几个小时前，日本的关键通胀指标在16个月来首次达到3%，凸显了日本持续的物价上涨势头。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge hit 3% for the first time in 16 months, underscoring the nation’s sustained price momentum just hours before the central bank is expected to hike rates for a third time under Governor Kazuo Ueda.】

item.title: 澳新银行称新西兰通胀可能因货币疲软而加快
item.description: 新西兰澳新银行（ANZ Bank New Zealand）的经济学家表示，由于货币疲软和油价上涨增加了进口商品的成本，新西兰今年的通货膨胀可能会加速。【原文：New Zealand inflation may accelerate this year as a weaker currency and rising oil prices increase the cost of imported goods, according to economists at ANZ Bank New Zealand.】

item.title: 蒙地帕斯基集团探讨收购意大利 Mediobanca 公司的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，意大利贷款机构 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 正在探讨收购 Mediobanca SpA 的潜在交易。【原文：Italian lender Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA is exploring a potential deal for Mediobanca SpA, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将搭乘华尔街乐观主义的顺风车：市场综述
item.description: 本周亚洲股市有望收高，此前科技股反弹推动华尔街创下历史新高。在唐纳德-特朗普总统敦促欧佩克降低原油价格并表示将推动减息之后，石油价格下跌。【原文：Asian equities were on track to close the week higher, following a rebound in technology stocks that pushed Wall Street to a record high. Oil fell after President Donald Trump urged OPEC to lower crude prices and said he will push for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 迪斯尼将艾格的薪酬提高 30%，以反映利润的好转
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.）将首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）在 2024 财年的薪酬总额提高了 30%，突显了他对这家媒体和娱乐公司的扭转。【原文：Walt Disney Co. boosted Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger’s total pay by 30% in fiscal 2024, underscoring his turnaround of the media and entertainment company.】

item.title: 波音公司杰普逊部门吸引航空航天和收购者
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，在下周第一轮竞标截止日期到来之前，波音公司可能出售其捷普森导航部门的计划正吸引着主要航空供应商和私募股权收购者。【原文：Boeing Co.’s potential sale of its Jeppesen navigation unit is attracting major aviation suppliers and private equity suitors ahead of the deadline for first-round bids next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 风暴过后力拓第一季度铁矿石出口量下降
item.description: 澳大利亚西北部的热带气旋破坏了一个港口设施，力拓集团警告本季度的铁矿石运输将受到影响。【原文：Rio Tinto Group warned shipments of iron ore will be impacted this quarter after a tropical cyclone in Australia’s northwest damaged a port facility.】

item.title: 道明银行洗钱部主管马扎里戈斯离职，桑朱阿斯升职
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）正在提拔其美国反洗钱部门的一名高级管理人员杰奎琳-桑朱亚斯（Jacqueline Sanjuas），让她负责整个银行的金融犯罪风险管理。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is promoting one of its top US anti-money-laundering executives, Jacqueline Sanjuas, to a role that will see her head up financial crime risk management for the entire bank.】
